text: (o visvasulara!) Miru vari vaddaku marali vaccina taruvata varini vadali pettalani (miru varipai carya tisuko gudadani), varu mi mundu allah peruto pramanalu cestaru. Kavuna miru vari nundi vimukhulu kandi. Niscayanga, varu asuculu (malin'yam vantivaru). Vari nivasam narakame. Ade varu arjincina dani phalitam
